title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.11 - Education
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 304.11 - Education

State Regulations

Inmates in special housing units will be offered the
opportunity to participate in a cell study program. However, an inmate assigned
to a disciplinary housing unit will be offered the opportunity to participate
in a cell study program to the extent possible based upon the inmate's overall
behavioral adjustment. Education counselors, teachers or other appropriate
staff members may visit the special housing inmates as needed to provide
assistance to any inmate participating in a cell study
program. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7

304.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
